revised_title: The Interaction of Atoms and Molecules with Solid Surfaces: Condensation and Evaporation
tldr: This article explores the interaction of atoms and molecules with solid surfaces, focusing on the processes of condensation and evaporation. The authors develop a theory that relates to the method of statistical mechanics and provide numerical results for typical cases, including isotopic molecules like HD and D2. They also evaluate the coefficient of condensation and its dependence on temperature and the characteristic temperature of the solid.
